task.instruction: Your user ID is mei_hernandez_8984. You have a round-trip reservation from Los Angeles (LAX) to Boston (BOS) with stopovers through San Francisco (SFO) and Miami (MIA), under reservation ID R9QDGB. The trip has 4 flight segments. You are currently traveling with three passengers: Mei Hernandez, Liam Kovacs, and Anya Anderson. You now want to: 1) Remove Liam Kovacs from the reservation, 2) Upgrade all four flight segments to business class, 3) Keep the same flights and dates, 4) Pay any fare difference using your gift card ending in 5309492, 5) Keep insurance and baggage allowances unchanged. Confirm all changes with me before applying them.
